description: [ZeroCleare](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1151) has used a vulnerable signed VBoxDrv driver to bypass Microsoft Driver Signature Enforcement (DSE) protections and subsequently load the unsigned [RawDisk](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0364) driver.(Citation: IBM ZeroCleare Wiper December 2019)

external_references.description: Kessem, L. (2019, December 4). New Destructive Wiper ZeroCleare Targets Energy Sector in the Middle East. Retrieved September 4, 2024.
